page.title: 20TELEVISION
page.content: TELEVISION __________ Two years ago a new welsh television channel was set up.It is called S4C and provides us with lots of Welsh language programmes.My favourite programme is "SUPERTED"-a cartoon character who is like superman.The cartoon is seen in many countries.Another good cartoon is "WIL CWAC CWAC"_the story of a little duck,taken from a popular childrens book called "LLYFR MAWR Y PLANT".We can also watch English programmes on BBC WALES,BBC2,HTV and ITV.We use the video a lot to record programmes and we hope to produce our own programmes before long using a video camera in school.
